00009 import newtonERP.module.AbstractEntity;
00010 import newtonERP.module.AbstractOrmEntity;
00011 import newtonERP.orm.Orm;
00012 import newtonERP.orm.associations.PluralAccessor;
00013 
00018 public class RightCheck extends AbstractAction
00019 {
00020         @Override
00021         public AbstractEntity doAction(AbstractEntity entity,
00022                         Hashtable<String, String> parameters)
00023         {
00024                 Vector<String> search = new Vector<String>();
00025                 search.add("name='" + parameters.get("name") + "'");
00026 
00027                 // todo: correct deprecate
00028                 Vector<AbstractOrmEntity> userList = Orm.select(new User(), search);
00029 
00030                 if (userList.size() < 1)// Utilisateur introuvable
00031                         return null;
00032 
00033                 User user = (User) userList.get(0);
00034 
00035                 Right searchEntity = new Right();
00036                 searchEntity.setData("moduleName", parameters.get("module"));
00037                 searchEntity.setData("actionName", parameters.get("action"));
00038                 if (parameters.get("entity") != null)
00039                         searchEntity.setData("entityName", parameters.get("entity"));
00040 
00041                 PluralAccessor rightList = user.getGroupsEntity().getPluralAccessor(
00042                                 "Right", searchEntity);
00043 
00044                 if (rightList.size() > 0)
00045                         return rightList.get(0);
00046                 return null;
00047         }
00048 }
